Name: Dementor
Stats: STR 6, DEX 16, CON 16, INT 12, WIS 14, CHA 18
Damage Resistances: Acid, Fire, Lightning, Thunder; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
Condition Immunities: Charmed, Exhaustion, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained
Languages: Understands Common and Deep Speech but doesnâ€™t speak
Abilities:
Incorporeal Movement: Can move through creatures and objects as if difficult terrain.
Aura of Despair: Creatures within 10 ft have disadvantage on saves vs fear.
Dementor's Kiss (Recharge 6): One creature within 5 ft must succeed on DC 15 CON save or lose one spell slot (highest remaining), and take 4d10 psychic damage. Half on success.
Actions: Life Drain (Melee Weapon Attack): +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one creature. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) necrotic damage. Target must succeed DC 15 CON save or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken.
